overview: For many inhabitants of this world, the dystopia is not a future possibility but rather a historical reality. Odorless Blue Flowers Awake Prematurely is dystopian nonfiction, a science-fiction documentary, which explores Beirut’s peripheral rustbelt that sits on the  banks of the city’s river and is affected by the blast on August 4, 2020.
title: Odorless Blue Flowers Awake Prematurely
